title: Intentions for the Week
description: Intentions for the Week- Week 2 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! This is our first Monday of the New Year!! Wahoo. Wow! We are on our way back from Idaho spending time with family after the death of my brother-in-law It was good to be together and celebrate his life. Thank goodness for technology. I hosted Self-Check-In yesterday to map out my Intentions for the WeekÂ  and here we are!Â  This week I will work on my Intentions for the Year so I can co-host this workshop! Intention Setting Online Workshop 2025 Saturday, January 11 10 AM-12 PMÂ  If you are working on a Currently Workbook with me this year (thank you, YAY!) we can get started on our workbooks together in the workshop.Â  I ordered more Currently Workbooks and will have them in the shop soon. If you want to get started on tracking parts of the year/make your own binder, I have a digital version of the workbook that you can fill in. Here are my Intentions for the Week!Â  Intentions this WeekÂ  This weekâ€™s intentions:Â  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out myÂ Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in myÂ food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day work in Currently workbook check-in with calendarÂ  art time floss daily horoscope open forum The Hope Circuit connect with my spiritÂ  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitaminsÂ  stay hydratedÂ  read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the weekÂ  i love listsÂ  record stuff my everyday life Intentions for the YearÂ  tracyâ€™s tracking toolsÂ  hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In!Â  upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently WorkbookÂ  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders forÂ The Handwriting ClubÂ Â (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning onÂ my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspaceÂ  bookkeeping/pay bills emailsÂ  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop unpack from trip organize my office clear off work tables laundryÂ  litterboxes water indoor plantsÂ  water plants on deck go through pantryÂ  compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs put sheets on the bed pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garageÂ  refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Weekâ€™s Intentions:Â  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out myÂ Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in myÂ food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day new years rituals go into a body of water work in Currently workbook check-in with calendarÂ  art time floss daily horoscope open forum The Hope Circuit connect with my spiritÂ  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitaminsÂ  stay hydratedÂ  read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the weekÂ  i love listsÂ  record stuff my everyday life December 2024 tracyâ€™s tracking toolsÂ  hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In!Â  upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently WorkbookÂ  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders forÂ The Handwriting ClubÂ Â (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning onÂ my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspaceÂ  bookkeeping/pay bills emailsÂ  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop packing list laundryÂ  litterboxes water indoor plantsÂ  water plants on deck go through pantryÂ  compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs put sheets on the bed pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garageÂ  refill pill case garbage/recycling Â  Posts to Inspire: INSTANT POT APPLESAUCE LEMON GARLIC ROASTED SHRIMP LEMON GINGER ELIXIR LEMON CHICKEN BEET AVOCADO POKE BOWLS BLOOD ORANGE & AVOCADO SALAD AVOCADO SUPERFOOD SMOOTHIE Â  If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram!Â Iâ€™d love to see your creations!Â  Hereâ€™s a mood: This will help you keep a good pace if youâ€™re out walking!Â  Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action.Â  My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!Â  You can start it at any time of the year! I also have aÂ printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder.Â  Itâ€™s part of my Time Management Printable pack!Â  Need extra help? Join my accountability group: SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together.Â  Those are my Intentions for the Week!Â  Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!Â  Â  The post Intentions for the Week appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Intentions for the Week is a weekly TO DO list/planner started by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean.com & The Handwriting Club!

html:
Intentions for the Week- Week 2 in 2025

Hi hiiiiii! This is our first Monday of the New Year!! Wahoo. Wow! We are on our way back from Idaho spending time with family after the death of my brother-in-law ğŸ™ It was good to be together and celebrate his life.Â  Â Thank goodness for technology. I hosted Self-Check-In yesterday to map out my Intentions for the WeekÂ  and here we are!Â 

This week I will work on my Intentions for the Year so I can co-host this workshop!

Intention Setting Online Workshop 2025

Saturday, January 11

10 AM-12 PMÂ 

If you are working on a Currently Workbook with me this year (thank you, YAY!) we can get started on our workbooks together in the workshop.Â 

I ordered more Currently Workbooks and will have them in the shop soon. If you want to get started on tracking parts of the year/make your own binder, I have a digital version of the workbook that you can fill in.

Here are my Intentions for the Week!Â 

Intentions this WeekÂ 

This weekâ€™s intentions:Â 

Mind/Body

  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out myÂ Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in myÂ food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch

My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!Â Â  You can start it at any time of the year!

Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!Â
